title: Drawing, Triumph of Peace, Roundel, for the Aldini Villa at Montmorency, 1813
title_raw: Triumph of Peace, Roundel, for the Aldini Villa at Montmorency
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and grey-brown wash over black chalk on textured paper
inscribed: inscribed inside the roundel, Parigi dipinta a Mo Moransi per S.  E. Aldini 4 Genaro 1813; PACE.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Victory riding in chariot drawn by two horses. She holds caduceus in left hand. Genii flying from opposite direction crowns her. Above, inscribed "PACE." Two cornucopiae at bottom.  Inscribed, inside roundel: Parigi dipinta a Mo Moransi per S.  E. Aldini 4 Genaro 1813.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Triumph of Peace, Roundel, for the Aldini Villa at Montmorency, 1813. Pen and brown ink, brush and grey-brown wash over black chalk on textured paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3375
